## Data Import: CSVs

Let's import data using the `readr` package.

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")
litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

Look at the data

```{r}
litters_df

head(litters_df)
tail(litters_df)
```

```{r, eval = FALSE}
View(litters_df)
```


```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```


`read_csv` options ..

```{r}
read_csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv")
```
